title: Vase with Base
description: vase, emerald green jade with cover and small ivory base 2 x 4-1/2 in.  H. 11-1/2  inches, W. 5-1/2 inches.  Vase, emerald green spinach jade, with cover.  On each side of the body a phoenix in flight surrounded by cloud forms and trailing streams in relief.  Handles and finial of bold peony buds deeply undercut.
creditline: Gift of Fireman's Fund Insurance Company
